channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Feel-Good Friday: NY Teenager Creates a Spectacular Christmas Lights Show... With Discarded Ornaments
A Cosmic Struggle: The Circumstances That Led to the Birth of Christ and the Holy Day of Christmas
Here's what's different in the new spending legislation approved by the House
item.description: House lawmakers voted 366-34 to approve the bill.

item.title: Senate passes bill to stop shutdown, sending it to President Biden's desk
item.description: Congress managed to pass a short-term spending bill through both chambers after going through three different versions of it.

item.title: NEW: US Senate Passes Bipartisan Continuing Resolution Bill
Brief government shutdown ushered in before Christmas as Senate works to advance House bill
item.description: Congress did not manage to send a spending bill to President Biden's desk before the pre-Christmas deadline.

item.title: Biden considers commuting the sentences of federal death row inmates: report
item.description: President Biden is reportedly considering commuting the sentences of most, if not all, of the 40 men on the federal governmentâ€™s death row.

item.title: The 34 House Republicans who voted against a bill to avert a partial government shutdown
item.description: Thirty-four House Republicans voted Friday against a spending bill to avoid a partial government shutdown, while no Democrats opposed the legislation.
